animeDescription: Looking at him, he ain't much. But Kenta scores with every girl he meets. Why, Well, he has a love-struck goddess who's decided to help him out. After the celestial sweetie takes a shine to him, she grants him the ability to seduce seven different women to find out which one is his true love, and in the end, it is a big suprise who his actual true love is.
animeStaff: [['Oomiya Saburou', ['Producer']], ['Nishihara Kumiko', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Takahashi Takeo', ['Key Animation']], ['Ledford John', ['Executive Producer']]]
